inclusion.criterion: A cancer survivor of breast, prostate, lung, colorectal, cervical or oral cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: survivor and live within the Baltimore Maryland area.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Finished your active cancer treatment at least three months ago.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Overweight or obese and do not exercise daily.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Do not have any physical limitation to do mild to moderate physical activities.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have a smart phone (iPhone or Android device) with Wi-Fi internet connection at home.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to accept the random study assignment.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to wear a Fitbit band 'a physical activity tracking device' on your wrist for five weeks every single day.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to have an Echo speaker 'a smart home speaker with voice assistant' installed in your home and use the digital voice assist for four weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to receive daily text messages on your phone for four weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide us with access to your Fitbit physical activities data.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Already doing moderate to high physical activities in their daily life (rapid screener).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Planning to relocate within the next 4-5 weeks.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 32-year-old obese woman with weight concerns, sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape. She has completed the four square step test in 14 seconds.
